plot: Vladimir and Benoît have always been the best of friends. One day, a dilemma arises that puts their friendship at risk.
title: Verset, refrain, verset
plot_es: Vladimir and Benoît have always been the best of friends. One day, a dilemma arises that puts their friendship at risk.
plot_en: Vladimir and Benoît have always been the best of friends. One day, a dilemma arises that puts their friendship at risk.
